trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Marion
There were no other sightings in Marion on or around August 28th 2012
Summary: object crossed sky then turned straight up through cloud and dimmed to dissapeared.
divs: Sighting Detailswhile sitting on the screened porch at nite I saw a round glowing object cross the sky and was bright almost white in color. turned straight up through a cloud and dimmed as it disappeared out of sight. Object left two circular smoke rings as it left top of cloud and went out of sight.
